name: UnzipFiles
description: extracts files from a zip, a pattern can be applied to extract only parts of the file.
author: Yod Labs

inputs.name: pattern
inputs.label: Include Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: File or folder paths to extract (relative to the paths stored on the zip file). If empty all files/folders will be unzipped. Supports minimatch patterns. [Minimatch examples at](https://github.com/isaacs/minimatch)

inputs.name: destinationFolder
inputs.label: Destination folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: the destination folder of the unzipped files.
